attributes.action: Make Carers Allowance avaliable to all carers, regardless of earning as long as they spend a minimum of 35 hours a week caring
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being a carer is hard work and if you choose to work it becomes even harder as you have to cope with a job and caring for a ill or disabled person. The extra costs involved in caring are still as much as a non-working carer and I feel that even if you earn over the current £95 a week limit you should be entitled to this benefit.
